original_text: It was Moses who said to the people of Israel, “God will send you a prophet. He will be one of your own people. He will speak God's message as I have done.”
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손에 대하여 하나님이 너희 형제 가운데서 나와 같은 선지자를 세우리라 하던 자가 곧 이 모세라

sentences.original_text: It was Moses who said to the people of Israel
God will send you a prophet
He will be one of your own people
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 너희 동족 중 한 사람이 될 것이다
